messages.content:
create a simple HTML5 app that displays 10 randomly colored circles in random x, y positions on the screen, and 10 randomly colored, random width lines between 10 random pairs of nodes. Random tree emojis are sprinkled throughout. A clock ticks once per second. All random values are updated once per second.
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
